uvi.description:
net: caif: fix memory leak in ldisc_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.129 by commit 343406f9c198c5f8e38720bd168c04ef666fe5d9. For more details please see the references link.
